title: Fitch Pushes Colombia Further Into Junk Citing Fiscal Deficits
description: Fitch Ratings downgraded Colombia’s credit rating one notch deeper into junk territory, citing persistently large budget deficits that will add to the nation’s debt load.
content: Fitch Ratings downgraded Colombia’s credit rating one notch deeper into junk territory, citing persistently large budget deficits that will add to the nation’s debt load.
